name: Inception
description: 2010. A skilled thief who infiltrates dreams to extract secrets is offered a chance to erase his criminal record by performing an almost-impossible 'inception' вЂ” planting an idea into someone's subconscious.

name: The Dark Knight
description: 2008. Batman must confront the chaotic Joker, whose ruthless campaign of terror forces Bruce Wayne to make impossible moral choices while Gotham descends into anarchy.

name: Interstellar
description: 2014. With Earth becoming uninhabitable, a team of explorers travels through a wormhole searching for a new home for humanity вЂ” a story about love, sacrifice and the science of relativity.

name: The Matrix
description: 1999. A hacker named Neo discovers that reality is a simulated construct controlled by machines, and joins a rebellion to free humanity from the Matrix.

name: The Shawshank Redemption
description: 1994. Wrongfully imprisoned banker Andy Dufresne forms a powerful friendship with fellow inmate Red, surviving decades of hardship through hope, cleverness and quiet dignity.

name: The Godfather
description: 1972. The powerful Corleone mafia family navigates power, loyalty and betrayal as patriarch Vito Corleone tries to protect his empire and prepare his reluctant son Michael for leadership.

name: Pulp Fiction
description: 1994. Interwoven stories of crime, redemption and dark humor in 1990s Los Angeles вЂ” a nonlinear crime masterpiece famous for its sharp dialogue and memorable characters.

name: Fight Club
description: 1999. An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club with a charismatic soap salesman, unleashing chaos and challenging modern consumer culture вЂ” a psychological dark drama.

name: Forrest Gump
description: 1994. The gentle and honest Forrest, unintentionally present at many historical moments, tells the story of love, fate and an ordinary man's extraordinary life.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: 2001. A young hobbit, Frodo, inherits a powerful ring and sets out with a fellowship to destroy it in the fires of Mount Doom вЂ” the beginning of an epic fantasy saga.

name: Spirited Away
description: 2001. A young girl becomes trapped in a mysterious spirit world and must work in a bathhouse for supernatural beings to find a way to rescue her parents and return home.
2014. A young drummer enrolls at a competitive music conservatory and faces an obsessive instructor whose brutal teaching methods push him toward excellence and self-destruction.

name: Parasite
description: 2019. A poor family schemes to infiltrate a wealthy household, triggering a darkly comic and escalating clash that explores class, greed and social inequality.

name: Blade Runner 2049
description: 2017. A blade runner uncovers a long-buried secret that leads him on a quest to find a former blade runner and unravel mysteries about identity and humanity.
